document_data.caption: A map of Huzuz showing the Avenue of the Sea lined in black.
document_data.name: Avenue of the Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Avenue of the Sea''', or the '''Fishers' Road''', was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Avenue of the Sea entered Huzuz through a gate in the northwest corner of the city where it branched from the [[River Road]], travelling southeast between the [[Merchants' District]] and [[Northwest District]] before terminating at the [[Grand Bazaar]]. As the name implied, this was a popular road for fishermen to use in order to bring their fresh catches to the great market.
